examples.title: EXAMPLE 1
examples.code:
using CodeGlyphX;
            var png = AztecCode.Png("Ticket: CONF-2024");

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves Aztec to a file based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(string text, string path, AztecEncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions, string title)
